title: "Researchers use AI datasets to track feral pigs, minimize disease risk"
excerpt: "Feral pigs cost the agriculture industry at least $1.5 billion in damage, disease and control costs around the United States annually, running rampant on large swaths of grazing lands. The swine root in soil and eat most everything in sight."
